name: Ice Cream Escape
description:
You are an ice cream scoop separated from your brethren at birth. Traverse the harsh conditions of the deadly heated maze before you melt into nothingness and reclaim your place amongst the other scoops.

Overall this game is just an experiment in camera movement, colliders, and level design. I really like trippy games like Superliminal that break conventional gaming rules so the last level was supposed to invoke a similar level of plot twist. Hope it's intuitive nonetheless.
